trans-unit.source: Provides a way to encrypt or hash data (or both) by using the same algorithms and key values that are used for ASP.NET forms authentication and view state.
The <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey> class provides methods that expose the hashing and encryption logic that ASP.NET provides.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey> classe fornece métodos que expõem a lógica de hash e de criptografia que o ASP.NET fornece.

trans-unit.source: For information about which encryption and hashing algorithms ASP.NET uses, and the key values that it uses with them, see [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre quais criptografia e algoritmos de hash usa ASP.NET e os valores de chave que ele utiliza com eles, consulte [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey> APIs should only be used in an ASP.NET app.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey> APIs só deve ser usados em um aplicativo ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: Behavior of the MachineKey APIs outside the context of an ASP.NET application is undefined
trans-unit.target: O comportamento das APIs MachineKey fora do contexto de um aplicativo ASP.NET é indefinido

trans-unit.source: The data to encrypt, hash, decrypt, or validate does not exist
The encrypted data to decrypt and/or validate.
Indicates whether the <c>encodedData</c> parameter should be encrypted and/or hashed.
Decodes and/or validates data that has been encrypted or provided with a hash-based message authentication code (HMAC).
A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array that represents the decrypted data.

For information about which encryption and hashing algorithms ASP.NET uses to decrypt and validate the data that is passed in, see [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre quais criptografia e algoritmos de hash ASP.NET usa para descriptografar e validar os dados que são transmitidos, consulte [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46).

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de código, consulte o <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: The data to encrypt.
Indicates whether the <c>data</c> parameter should be encrypted and/or hashed.
Encrypts data and/or appends a hash-based message authentication code (HMAC).
The encrypted value, the input value with an HMAC appended, or the result of encrypting the input value with an HMAC appended.

For information about which encryption and hashing algorithms ASP.NET uses to decrypt and validate the data that is passed in, see [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre quais criptografia e algoritmos de hash ASP.NET usa para descriptografar e validar os dados que são transmitidos, consulte [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46).

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de código, consulte o <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: The data to protect.
This data is passed as plaintext.
A list of purposes for the data.

If this value is specified, the same list must be passed to the <see cref="M:System.Web.Security.MachineKey.Unprotect(System.Byte[],System.String[])" /> method in order to decipher the returned ciphertext.
Protects the specified data by encrypting or signing it.
The ciphertext data.
This method supersedes the <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey.Encode%2A> method, which requires the caller to specify whether the plaintext data should be encrypted, signed, or both.
trans-unit.target: Esse método substitui o <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey.Encode%2A> método, que exige que o chamador especificar se os dados de texto sem formatação devem ser criptografados, assinado, ou ambos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey.Protect%2A> method performs the appropriate operation and securely protects the data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey.Protect%2A> método executa a operação apropriada e com segurança protege os dados.

trans-unit.source: Ciphertext data produced by this method can only be deciphered by the <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey.Unprotect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Dados de texto cifrado produzidos por esse método só podem ser decifrados pelo <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey.Unprotect%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The `purposes` parameter is an optional list of reasons that can lock the ciphertext to a specific purpose.
trans-unit.target: O `purposes` parâmetro é uma lista opcional de razões que podem bloquear o texto cifrado para um propósito específico.

trans-unit.source: This parameter lets you isolate cryptographic operations performed by different subsystems within an application.
trans-unit.target: Esse parâmetro permite isolar as operações de criptografia executadas pelo subsistemas diferentes dentro de um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: A malicious client should not be able to get the result of one subsystem's <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey.Protect%2A> method and feed it as input to another subsystem's <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey.Unprotect%2A> method, which could compromise application security.
trans-unit.target: Um cliente mal-intencionado não deve ser capaz de obter o resultado de um subsistema <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey.Protect%2A> método e o feed como entrado para outra do subsistema <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey.Unprotect%2A> método, que pode comprometer a segurança do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The `purposes` parameter helps ensure that protected data can only be used by the component that originally generated it.
trans-unit.target: O `purposes` parâmetro ajuda a garantir que os dados protegidos só podem ser usados pelo componente que originalmente gerou.

trans-unit.source: Applications should make sure that each subsystem uses a unique `purposes` list.
trans-unit.target: Aplicativos devem garantir que cada subsistema usa uma única `purposes` lista.

trans-unit.source: For example, to protect or unprotect an authentication token, you could call the method using code like the following example:
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para proteger ou desproteger um token de autenticação, você poderia chamar o método usando código como o exemplo a seguir:

trans-unit.source: Applications can dynamically generate the `purposes` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Aplicativos podem gerar dinamicamente o `purposes` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: In that case, prefix user-supplied values with a fixed value (like "`Username:` " + *username*) to minimize the risk of a malicious client crafting input that matches a token that is used by some other part of the system.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, os valores fornecidos pelo usuário com um valor fixo de prefixo (como "`Username:` " + *username*) para minimizar o risco de um cliente mal-intencionado criação de entrada que corresponde a um token que é usado por alguma outra parte do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Any dynamically-generated strings should come after fixed strings.
trans-unit.target: Cadeias de caracteres gerados dinamicamente devem vir após cadeias de caracteres fixas.

trans-unit.source: For example, to protect or unprotect a private message that is tied to a specific user, use code like the following example:
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para proteger ou desproteger uma mensagem privada que está associada a um usuário específico, use um código como o exemplo a seguir:

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey.Unprotect%2A> method is called, the value that is provided for the `purposes` parameter must be the same value that was provided to the <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey.Protect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey.Unprotect%2A> método é chamado, o valor fornecido para o `purposes` parâmetro deve ser o mesmo valor que foi fornecido para o <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey.Protect%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the operation will fail with a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, a operação falhará com um <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> exceção.

trans-unit.source: The configuration settings that are required for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyCompatibilityMode.Framework45?displayProperty=nameWithType> option are required for this method even if the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.CompatibilityMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is not set to the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyCompatibilityMode.Framework45> option.
trans-unit.target: As definições de configuração que são necessárias para o <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyCompatibilityMode.Framework45?displayProperty=nameWithType> opção são necessários para este se até mesmo método de <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection.CompatibilityMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade não é definida como o <xref:System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeyCompatibilityMode.Framework45> opção.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="userData" /> parameter is null.
The purposes array contains one or more whitespace-only entries.
The ciphertext data to unprotect.
A list of purposes that describe what the data is meant for.
This must be the same value that was passed to the <see cref="M:System.Web.Security.MachineKey.Protect(System.Byte[],System.String[])" /> method when the data was protected.
Unprotects the specified data, which was protected by the <see cref="M:System.Web.Security.MachineKey.Protect(System.Byte[],System.String[])" /> method.
The plaintext data.
For information about this method, see the <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey.Protect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre esse método, consulte o <xref:System.Web.Security.MachineKey.Protect%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="protectedData" /> parameter is null.
The purposes array contains one or more whitespace-only entries.
Possible causes include the following:
The protected data was tampered with.
The value of the <paramref name="purposes" /> parameter is not the same as the value that was specified when the data was protected.
The application is deployed to more than one server and is using auto-generated encryption keys.
